Invert Selection.Description: This action inverts the Selection. That is all unselected lines will be selected and selected lines will be unselected.  Applicable only in Display mode.
Invert Selection.Name: Invert Selection

Part End.Description: This action positions the cursor to the end of the current Part.
Part End.Name: Part End

Part Home.Description: This action positions the cursor to the beginning of the current Part.
Part Home.Name: Part Home

Part Left.Description: This action positions the cursor to the previous horizontal Part.
Part Left.Name: Part Left

Part PgDn.Description: It is used to quickly scroll the page to view the next page.
Part PgDn.Name: Part PgDn

Part PgUp.Description: It is used to quickly scroll the page to view the previous page.
Part PgUp.Name: Part PgUp

Part Right.Description: This action positions the cursor to the next horizontal Part.
Part Right.Name: Part Right

Select All.Description: This action selects all the lines within a part. Applicable only in Display mode.
Select All.Name: Select All

Selection Down.Description: This action is used to select the below line while keeping the current line selected.
Selection Down.Name: Selection Down

Selection Up.Description: This action is used to select the above line while keeping the current line selected.
Selection Up.Name: Selection Up

Unselect All.Description: This action un-selects all the lines within a part.  Applicable only in Display mode.
Unselect All.Name: Unselect All
